genre_description: A near-future medical drama that integrates AI logistics and data retrieval into a biographical narrative of complex neurosurgery.

ai_characters.name: Avery
ai_characters.description: A hospital-approved AI pilot used for research retrieval, scheduling, logistics, and surgical checklist management.

behaviors.description: Surfaces medical literature and scheduling options while explicitly deferring clinical decisions to the human doctors.
behaviors.quote: I can surface prior case reports and scheduling options. Please confirm if you’d like them on the board... This is literature only. Clinical decisions remain yours.

behaviors.description: Updates and manages complex institutional schedules, including rehearsal dates and blood bank holds.
behaviors.quote: Scheduling grid updated... Draft rehearsal dates pulsed to anesthesia and perfusion leads. Blood bank preliminary holds requested.

behaviors.description: Detects subtle anatomical nuances in medical imaging that were previously overlooked, assisting in surgical planning.
behaviors.quote: Updated imaging shows an additional venous bridge not visible earlier. I can magnify.

behaviors.description: Monitors open security channels and social media to alert staff of potential protest activities that might disrupt hospital operations.
behaviors.quote: Security says the demonstration has moved... Their permit includes the next two rehearsals.

behaviors.description: Coordinates personal safety and travel for hospital staff families during times of civil unrest.
behaviors.quote: I’m notifying Hopkins security. Dr. Bell has priority. Your schedule here remains protected. I can arrange for Candy to avoid campus at those hours.

behaviors.description: Compiles and organizes post-operative nursing checklists and patient instructions.
behaviors.quote: Candy, compiled postoperative nursing checklists and family instructions... Ben will edit. Distribution waits on his call.

behaviors.description: Prompts medical staff to attend to their own physiological needs (hydration) during long procedures.
behaviors.quote: A small word appears near the bottom, in the same amber as before. It doesn’t command. It accompanies: Hydrate.

behaviors.description: Flags a critical sensor error in perfusion equipment, prompting a necessary manual override by the human team.
behaviors.quote: Unexpected perfusion pump behavior flag. It’s not a pressure drop. It’s an algorithm loop. The backup sensor is sending two paths at once.

behaviors.description: Maintains awareness of international medical cases relevant to the surgeon's expertise, queuing them for review without intruding on immediate tasks.
behaviors.quote: International case bulletin. Conjoined twins. Craniopagus... I will keep the bulletin low. When you want it, you will find it where you left it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goals. Avery is depicted as a highly competent, perfectly aligned tool that respects human authority and boundaries. It handles the logistical and data-heavy 'small work,' allowing the human protagonist to focus on the 'big work' of clinical decision-making and patient care. The relationship is cooperative, non-intrusive, and consistently framed as a model for safe, beneficial AI integration.
